snippet.title: DUCKSIDE – Open Beta Trailer | tinyBuild Connect 2024
snippet.description:
🦆 Join the flock and sign up for the Beta NOW 🦆

Welcome to DUCKSIDE, a persistent world survival game where you step into the webbed feet of hat wearing, weapon wielding, combat ready Ducks. DUCKSIDE is a persistent world survival game like DayZ or RUST featuring PVP, PVE, deep, intuitive crafting and base building systems, exhilarating flight mechanics, pulse pounding combat and a huge, vibrant world that hosted over 150,000 ducks in the last beta.
Sign up for the open beta now and join the action on June 6th!
